title: Need help with a zz ligature
content:
Hi, I made this signature for a client and I’m having problems to solve the “ZZ” ligature. If anybody wants to recommend a solution, please, let me know.

comments.content: Try closing up the spacing of the two z letters and allowing the loops to overlap, then vary the size of the loops, making the second one smaller than the first.
